atk-s0511a3:1_0: Rammanagaravāsinopi te upāsakā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṁ datvā puna bhagavantaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā dānānumodanaṁ sotukāmā upanisīdiṁsu.
atk-s0511a3:1_1: Atha satthā tesaṁ paramamadhuraṁ hadayaṅgamaṁ dānānumodanamakāsi –
atk-s0511a3:13_0: Ko hi nāma naro loke, na dadeyya hite rato.
atk-s0511a3:15_0: Na dajjā sukhappadaṁ dānaṁ, dānaṁ cittappamodanaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:19_0: Kittimanantaṁ yāti ca dātā, vissasanīyo hoti ca dātā.
atk-s0511a3:20_0: ‘‘Datvā dānaṁ yāti naro so, bhogasamiddhiṁ dīghañcāyu;
atk-s0511a3:21_0: Sussaratampi ca vindati rūpaṁ, sagge saddhiṁ kīḷati devehi;
atk-s0511a3:24_0: Dadāti taṁ sāvakañāṇabhūmiṁ, paccekabhūmiṁ pana buddhabhūmi’’nti. –
atk-s0511a3:25_0: Evamādinā nayena dānānumodanaṁ katvā dānānisaṁsaṁ pakāsetvā tadanantaraṁ sīlakathaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0511a3:26_0: ‘‘Sīlaṁ sukhānaṁ paramaṁ nidānaṁ, sīlena sīlī tidivaṁ payāti;
atk-s0511a3:28_0: ‘‘Avassayo sīlasamo janānaṁ, kuto panañño idha vā parattha;
atk-s0511a3:29_0: Sīlaṁ guṇānaṁ paramā patiṭṭhā, yathā dharā thāvarajaṅgamānaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:32_0: Sīlālaṅkārasamo alaṅkāro natthi, sīlagandhasamo gandho natthi, sīlasamaṁ kilesamalavisodhanaṁ natthi, sīlasamaṁ pariḷāhūpasamaṁ natthi, sīlasamaṁ kittijananaṁ natthi, sīlasamaṁ saggārohaṇasopānaṁ natthi, nibbānanagarappavesane ca sīlasamaṁ dvāraṁ natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a3:36_0: Yo samaṁ anuvāte ca, paṭivāte ca vāyati. (visuddhi. 1.9);
atk-s0511a3:37_0: ‘‘Na pupphagandho paṭivātameti, na candanaṁ taggaramallikā vā;
atk-s0511a3:38_0: Satañca gandho paṭivātameti, sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyati.
atk-s0511a3:40_0: Etesaṁ gandhajātānaṁ, sīlagandho anuttaro. (dha. pa. 54-55; mi. pa. 5.4.1);
atk-s0511a3:41_0: ‘‘Na gaṅgā yamunā cāpi, sarabhū vā sarasvatī;
atk-s0511a3:44_0: Visodhayati sattānaṁ, yaṁ ve sīlajalaṁ malaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:45_0: ‘‘Na taṁ sajaladā vātā, na cāpi haricandanaṁ;
atk-s0511a3:46_0: Neva hārā na maṇayo, na candakiraṇaṅkurā.
atk-s0511a3:48_0: Yaṁ sameti idaṁ ariyaṁ, sīlaṁ accantasītalaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:52_0: Dvāraṁ vā pana nibbāna, nagarassa pavesane.
atk-s0511a3:55_1: ‘‘idaṁ pana sīlaṁ nissāya ayaṁ saggo labhatī’’ti dassanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ saggakathaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0511a3:55_2: Ayaṁ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo ekantasukho niccamettha kīḷā niccaṁ sampattiyo labhanti.
atk-s0511a3:55_3: Cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṁ dibbasampattiṁ paṭilabhanti.
atk-s0511a3:55_4: Tāvatiṁsā tisso vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānīti evamādisaggaguṇapaṭisaṁyuttakathaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0511a3:55_6: ‘‘ayampi saggo anicco adhuvo na tattha chandarāgo kātabbo’’ti kāmānaṁ ādīnavaṁ okāraṁ saṁkilesaṁ nekkhamme ānisaṁsañca pakāsetvā amatapariyosānaṁ dhammakathaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0511a3:55_7: Evaṁ tassa mahājanassa dhammaṁ desetvā ekacce saraṇesu ca ekacce pañcasīlesu ca ekacce sotāpattiphale ca ekacce sakadāgāmiphale ekacce anāgāmiphale ekacce catūsupi phalesu ekacce tīsu vijjāsu ekacce chasu abhiññāsu ekacce aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu patiṭṭhāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā rammanagarato nikkhamitvā sudassanamahāvihārameva pāvisi.
atk-s0511a3:61_0: Kañci pañcasu sīlesu, sīle dasavidhe paraṁ.
atk-s0511a3:64_0: Kassaci asame dhamme, deti so paṭisambhidā.
atk-s0511a3:77_1: Saraṇanti ettha saraṇaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ saraṇassa gantā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0511a3:77_2: Sarati hiṁsati vināsetīti saraṇaṁ, kiṁ taṁ?
atk-s0511a3:77_4: Taṁ pana saraṇagatānaṁ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṁ santāsaṁ dukkhaṁ duggatiṁ parikkilesaṁ hanati hiṁsati vināsetīti saraṇanti vuccatīti.
atk-s0511a3:78_0: ‘‘Ye keci buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṁ;
atk-s0511a3:79_0: Pahāya mānusaṁ dehaṁ, devakāyaṁ paripūressanti. (dī. ni. 2.332; saṁ. ni. 1.37);
atk-s0511a3:80_0: ‘‘Ye keci dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṁ;
atk-s0511a3:81_0: Pahāya mānusaṁ dehaṁ, devakāyaṁ paripūressanti. (dī. ni. 2.332; saṁ. ni. 1.37);
atk-s0511a3:82_0: ‘‘Ye keci saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṁ;
atk-s0511a3:83_0: Pahāya mānusaṁ dehaṁ, devakāyaṁ paripūressantī’’ti. (dī. ni. 2.332; saṁ. ni. 1.37);
atk-s0511a3:84_2: Evaṁ tāva saraṇaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ saraṇassa gantā cāti idaṁ tayaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:85_0: Tassāti taṁ dīpaṅkaraṁ, upayogatthe sāmivacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:85_3: Saraṇāgamane kañcīti kañci puggalaṁ saraṇagamane nivesetīti attho.
atk-s0511a3:85_4: Kiñcāpi paccuppannavasena vuttaṁ, atītakālavasena pana attho gahetabbo.
atk-s0511a3:85_7: Kañci pañcasu sīlesūti kañci puggalaṁ pañcasu viratisīlesu nivesesīti attho.
atk-s0511a3:85_9: Sīle dasavidhe paranti aparaṁ puggalaṁ dasavidhe sīle nivesesīti attho.
atk-s0511a3:85_10: ‘‘Kassaci kusale dasā’’tipi pāṭho, tassa kañci puggalaṁ dasa kusaladhamme samādapesīti attho.
atk-s0511a3:85_11: Kassaci deti sāmaññanti ettha paramatthato sāmaññanti maggo vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a3:87_0: Caturo phalamuttameti cattāri uttamāni phalānīti attho.
atk-s0511a3:87_3: Yathopanissayaṁ cattāro magge cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni kassaci adāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a3:87_4: Kassaci asame dhammeti kassaci asadise cattāro paṭisambhidādhamme adāsi.
atk-s0511a3:88_0: Kassaci varasamāpattiyoti kassaci pana nīvaraṇavigamena padhānabhūtā aṭṭha samāpattiyo adāsi.
atk-s0511a3:88_1: Tisso kassaci vijjāyoti kassaci puggalassa upanissayavasena dibbacakkhuñāṇapubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaāsavakkhayañāṇānaṁ vasena tisso vijjāyo.
atk-s0511a3:88_2: Chaḷabhiññā pavecchatīti cha abhiññāyo kassaci adāsi.
atk-s0511a3:89_0: Tena yogenāti tena nayena tenānukkamena ca.
atk-s0511a3:89_4: Ito uparipi īdisesu vacanesu atītakālavaseneva attho gahetabbo .
atk-s0511a3:89_5: Tena vitthārikaṁ āsīti tena dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato ovādena anusāsaniyā vitthārikaṁ vitthataṁ visālībhūtaṁ sāsanaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0511a3:90_0: Mahāhanūti mahāpurisānaṁ kira dvepi hanūni paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyā pakkhassa candasadisākārāni hontīti mahantāni hanūni yassa so mahāhanu, sīhahanūti vuttaṁ hoti.
atk-s0511a3:90_1: Usabhakkhandhoti usabhasseva khandho yassa bhavati, so usabhakkhandho.
atk-s0511a3:90_4: Bahū jane tārayatīti bahū buddhaveneyye jane tāresi.
atk-s0511a3:91_1: Tattha bodhaneyyaṁ jananti bodhaneyyaṁ pajaṁ, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0511a3:91_2: Disvāti buddhacakkhunā vā samantacakkhunā vā disvā.
atk-s0511a3:91_4: Idaṁ pana dasasahassiyaṁyeva sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:92_0: Dīpaṅkaro kira satthā buddhattaṁ patvā bodhimūle sattasattāhaṁ vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe mahābrahmuno dhammajjhesanaṁ paṭiññāya sunandārāme dhammacakkaṁ pavattetvā koṭisataṁ devamanussānaṁ dhammāmataṁ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a3:93_0: Atha satthā attano puttassa samavaṭṭakkhandhassa usabhakkhandhassa nāma ñāṇaparipākaṁ ñatvā taṁ atrajaṁ pamukhaṁ katvā rāhulovādasadisaṁ dhammaṁ desetvā devamanussānaṁ navutikoṭiyo dhammāmataṁ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a3:94_0: Puna bhagavā amaravatīnagaradvāre mahāsirīsarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ katvā mahājanassa bandhanāmokkhaṁ katvā devagaṇaparivuto divasakarātirekajutivisarabhavane tāvatiṁsabhavane pāricchattakamūle paramasītale paṇḍukambalasilātale nisīditvā sabbadevagaṇapītisañjananiṁ attano jananiṁ sumedhādeviṁ pamukhaṁ katvā sabbalokaviditavisuddhidevo devadevo dīpaṅkaro bhagavā sabbasattahitakaraṁ paramātirekagambhīrasukhumaṁ buddhivisadakaraṁ sattappakaraṇaṁ abhidhammapiṭakaṁ desetvā navutidevakoṭisahassānaṁ dhammāmataṁ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a3:101_0: Dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a3:101_1: Tattha sunandārāme koṭisatasahassānaṁ paṭhamo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a3:105_0: Athāparena samayena dasabalo catūhi bhikkhusatasahassehi parivuto gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā mahājanānuggahaṁ karonto cārikaṁ caramāno anukkamena ekasmiṁ padese mahājanakatasakkāraṁ sabbalokavissutaṁ amanussapariggahitaṁ atibhayānakaṁ olambāmbudharaparicumbitakūṭaṁ vividhasurabhitarukusumavāsitakūṭaṁ nānāmigagaṇavicaritakūṭaṁ nāradakūṭaṁ nāma paramaramaṇīyaṁ pabbataṁ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a3:105_1: So kira pabbato nāradena nāma yakkhena pariggahito ahosi.
atk-s0511a3:105_2: Tattha pana tassa yakkhassa anusaṁvaccharaṁ mahājano manussabaliṁ upasaṁharati.
atk-s0511a3:106_0: Atha dīpaṅkaro kira bhagavā tassa mahājanassa upanissayasampattiṁ disvā tato bhikkhusaṅghaṁ cātuddisaṁ pesetvā adutiyo asahāyo mahākaruṇābalavasaṅgatahadayo tañca yakkhaṁ vinetuṁ taṁ nāradapabbataṁ abhiruhi.
atk-s0511a3:106_1: Atha so manussabhakkho sakahitanirapekkho paravadhadakkho yakkho makkhaṁ asahamāno kodhaparetamānaso dasabalaṁ bhiṁsāpetvā palāpetukāmo taṁ pabbataṁ cālesi.
atk-s0511a3:106_2: So kira pabbato tena cāliyamāno bhagavato ānubhāvena tasseva matthake patamāno viya ahosi.
atk-s0511a3:107_1: ‘‘handa naṁ agginā jhāpessāmī’’ti mahantaṁ atibhīmadassanaṁ aggikkhandhaṁ nibbattesi.
atk-s0511a3:107_2: So aggikkhandho paṭivāte khitto viya attanova dukkhaṁ janesi, na pana bhagavato cīvare aṁsumattampi daḍḍhuṁ samattho ahosi.
atk-s0511a3:107_3: Yakkho pana ‘‘samaṇo daḍḍho, na daḍḍho’’ti olokento dasabalaṁ saradasamayavimalakaranikaraṁ sabbajanaratikaraṁ rajanikaramiva sītalajalatalagatakamalakaṇṇikāya nisinnaṁ viya bhagavantaṁ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0511a3:107_4: ‘‘aho ayaṁ samaṇo mahānubhāvo, yaṁ yaṁ imassāhaṁ anatthaṁ karomi, so so mamūpariyeva patati, imaṁ pana samaṇaṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ me paṭisaraṇaṁ parāyanaṁ natthi, pathaviyaṁ upakkhalitā pathaviṁyeva nissāya uṭṭhahanti, handāhaṁ imaṁyeva samaṇaṁ saraṇaṁ gamissāmī’’ti.
atk-s0511a3:108_0: Athevaṁ pana so cintetvā bhagavato cakkālaṅkatatalesu pādesu sirasā nipatitvā –
atk-s0511a3:108_1: ‘‘accayo maṁ, bhante, accagamā’’ti vatvā bhagavantaṁ saraṇamagamāsi.
atk-s0511a3:108_3: So desanāpariyosāne dasahi yakkhasahassehi saddhiṁ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0511a3:108_4: Tasmiṁ kira divase sakalajambudīpatalavāsino manussā tassa balikammatthaṁ ekekagāmato ekekaṁ purisaṁ āhariṁsu.
atk-s0511a3:108_6: Atha so yakkho taṁ divasaṁ ābhatataṇḍulādikaṁ sabbaṁ tesaṁyeva datvā te balikammatthāya ānītamanusse dasabalassa niyyātesi.
atk-s0511a3:109_0: Atha satthā te manusse ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā antosattāheyeva sabbe arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā māghapuṇṇamāya koṭisatabhikkhumajjhagato caturaṅgasamannāgate sannipāte pātimokkhamuddisi.
atk-s0511a3:109_1: Caturaṅgāni nāma sabbeva ehibhikkhū honti, sabbe chaḷabhiññā honti, sabbe anāmantitāva āgatā, pannarasūposathadivaso cāti imāni cattāri aṅgāni nāma.
atk-s0511a3:113_0: Tattha pavivekagateti gaṇaṁ pahāya gate. Samiṁsūti sannipatiṁsu.
atk-s0511a3:114_0: Yadā pana dīpaṅkaro lokanāyako sudassananāmake pabbate vassāvāsamupagañchi, tadā kira jambudīpavāsino manussā anusaṁvaccharaṁ giraggasamajjaṁ karonti.
atk-s0511a3:114_1: Tasmiṁ kira samajje sannipatitā manussā dasabalaṁ disvā dhammakathaṁ sutvā tatra pasīditvā pabbajiṁsu.
atk-s0511a3:114_2: Mahāpavāraṇadivase satthā tesaṁ ajjhāsayānukūlaṁ vipassanākathaṁ kathesi.
atk-s0511a3:114_3: Taṁ sutvā te sabbe saṅkhāre sammasitvā vipassanānupubbena maggānupubbena ca arahattaṁ pāpuṇiṁsu.
atk-s0511a3:119_0: Antalikkhamhi caraṇo, pañcābhiññāsu pāragū’’ti. (dha. sa. aṭṭha. nidānakathā);
atk-s0511a3:120_0: Ayaṁ gāthā aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathāya nidānavaṇṇanāya dīpaṅkarabuddhavaṁse likhitā.
atk-s0511a3:121_0: Dīpaṅkare kira bhagavati dhammaṁ desente dasasahassānañca vīsatisahassānañca dhammābhisamayo ahosiyeva.
atk-s0511a3:121_1: Ekassa pana dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ catunnanti ca ādivasena abhisamayānaṁ anto natthi.
atk-s0511a3:121_2: Tasmā dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ vitthārikaṁ bāhujaññaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0511a3:125_2: Ekadvinnanti ekassa ceva dvinnañca , tiṇṇaṁ catunnaṁ…pe…
atk-s0511a3:125_4: Evaṁ asaṅkhyeyyābhisamayattā ca vitthārikaṁ mahantappattaṁ bahūhi paṇḍitehi devamanussehi niyyānikanti jaññaṁ jānitabbaṁ adhisīlasikkhādīhi iddhañca samādhiādīhi phītañca ahosi.
atk-s0511a3:129_0: Tattha suvisodhitanti suṭṭhu bhagavatā sodhitaṁ visuddhaṁ kataṁ.
atk-s0511a3:129_1: Dīpaṅkaraṁ kira satthāraṁ sabbakālaṁ chaḷabhiññānaṁ mahiddhikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ cattāri satasahassāni parivārenti.
atk-s0511a3:129_2: Tena ca samayena ye sekkhā kālakiriyaṁ karonti, te garahitā bhavanti, sabbe khīṇāsavā hutvāva parinibbāyantīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a3:129_3: Tasmā hi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṁ supupphitaṁ susamiddhaṁ khīṇāsavehi bhikkhūhi ativiya sobhittha.
atk-s0511a3:134_0: ‘‘Ye keci tena samayena, jahanti mānusaṁ bhavaṁ;
atk-s0511a3:139_0: Tattha cattāri satasahassānīti gaṇanāya dassitā evaṁ dassitagaṇanā ime bhikkhūti dassanatthaṁ ‘‘chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikā’’ti vuttanti evamattho gahetabbo.
atk-s0511a3:139_1: Atha vā chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikāti chaḷabhiññānaṁ mahiddhikānanti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:139_2: Parivārenti sabbadāti niccakālaṁ dasabalaṁ parivārenti, bhagavantaṁ muñcitvā katthaci na gacchantīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a3:139_4: Ayaṁ pana samaya-saddo samavāyādīsu navasu atthesu dissati. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a3:141_0: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissatī’’ti. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1; ma. ni. aṭṭha.
atk-s0511a3:141_1: 1.mūlapariyāyasuttavaṇṇanā; saṁ. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.1; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.1; dha. sa. aṭṭha.
atk-s0511a3:142_3: Appattamānasāti appattaṁ anadhigataṁ mānasaṁ yehi te appattamānasā.
atk-s0511a3:142_4: Mānasanti rāgassa ca cittassa ca arahattassa ca adhivacanaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:142_5: ‘‘Antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṁ carati mānaso’’ti (saṁ. ni. 1.151; mahāva.
atk-s0511a3:142_7: ‘‘Cittaṁ mano mānasaṁ hadayaṁ paṇḍara’’nti (dha. sa. 6; vibha. 184; mahāni. 1; cūḷani.
atk-s0511a3:142_18: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekhāya sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato hoti…pe…
atk-s0511a3:142_20: Ettāvatā kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekho hotī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.13).
atk-s0511a3:142_23: ‘‘sikkhati, sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccati.
atk-s0511a3:142_25: Adhisīlampi sikkhati adhicittampi adhipaññampi sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhu, tasmā sekhoti vuccatī’’ti (a. ni. 3.86).
atk-s0511a3:143_1: Pāvacananti pasatthaṁ vacanaṁ, vuddhippattaṁ vā vacanaṁ pavacanaṁ, pavacanameva pāvacanaṁ, sāsananti attho.
atk-s0511a3:144_0: Tassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato rammavatī nāma nagaraṁ ahosi, sudevo nāma khattiyo pitā, sumedhā nāma devī mātā, sumaṅgalo ca tisso cāti dve aggasāvakā, sāgato nāma upaṭṭhāko, nandā ca sunandā cāti dve aggasāvikā, bodhi tassa bhagavato pipphalirukkho ahosi, asītihatthubbedho, satasahassavassāni āyūti.
atk-s0511a3:144_1: Kiṁ panimesaṁ jātanagarādīnaṁ dassane payojananti ce? Vuccate –
atk-s0511a3:144_2: yassa yadi neva jātanagaraṁ na pitā na mātā paññāyeyya, imassa pana neva jātanagaraṁ na pitā na mātā paññāyati, devo vā sakko vā yakkho vā māro vā brahmā vā esa maññe, devānampi īdisaṁ pāṭihāriyaṁ anacchariyanti maññamānā na sotabbaṁ na saddahitabbaṁ maññeyyuṁ, tato abhisamayo na bhaveyya, asati abhisamaye niratthako buddhuppādo bhaveyya, aniyyānikaṁ sāsanaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:159_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0511a3:164_0: ‘‘Sā ca iddhi so ca yaso, tāni ca pādesu cakkaratanāni;
atk-s0511a3:166_0: Tattha sudevo nāma khattiyoti sudevo nāmassa khattiyo pitā ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a3:166_4: Dīparukkho vāti sampajjalitadīpamālākulo dīparukkho viya ārohapariṇāhasaṇṭhānapāripūrisampanno dvattiṁsavaralakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatasarīro vipphuritaraṁsijālāvisaratārāgaṇasamujjalamiva gaganatalaṁ bhagavā dharamānakāle sobhatīti sobhittha.
atk-s0511a3:166_5: Sālarājāva phullitoti pupphito sabbaphāliphullo sālarājarukkho viya ca sabbaphāliphullo yojanasatubbedho pāricchatto viya ca asītihatthubbedho bhagavā ativiya sobhati.
atk-s0511a3:167_4: ‘‘Santāretvā sadevaka’’ntipi pāṭho, tassa sadevakaṁ lokanti attho.
atk-s0511a3:167_5: Sā ca iddhīti sā ca sampatti ānubhāvo.
atk-s0511a3:167_6: So ca yasoti so ca parivāro.
atk-s0511a3:167_7: Sabbaṁ tamantarahitanti taṁ sabbaṁ vuttappakāraṁ sampattijātaṁ antarahitaṁ apagatanti attho.
atk-s0511a3:167_8: Nanu rittā sabbasaṅkhārāti sabbe pana saṅkhatadhammā nanu rittā tucchā, niccasārādirahitāti attho.
atk-s0511a3:168_1: Sambahulavāro pana nāgato, so ānetvā dīpetabbo.
atk-s0511a3:168_3: puttaparicchedo, bhariyāparicchedo, pāsādaparicchedo, agāravāsaparicchedo, nāṭakitthiparicchedo, abhinikkhamanaparicchedo, padhānaparicchedo, vihāraparicchedo, upaṭṭhākaparicchedoti.
atk-s0511a3:168_5: Tassa pana dīpaṅkarassa bhariyānaṁ tisatasahassaṁ ahosi.
atk-s0511a3:168_6: Tassa aggamahesī padumā nāma, tassa pana putto usabhakkhandho nāma.
atk-s0511a3:175_0: Sabbabuddhānaṁ pana pañca vemattāni honti āyuvemattaṁ pamāṇavemattaṁ kulavemattaṁ padhānavemattaṁ rasmivemattanti.
atk-s0511a3:175_1: Tattha āyuvemattaṁ nāma keci dīghāyukā honti keci appāyukā.
atk-s0511a3:175_2: Tathā hi dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato vassasatasahassaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ ahosi, amhākaṁ bhagavato vassasataṁ.
atk-s0511a3:176_0: Pamāṇavemattaṁ nāma keci dīghā honti keci rassā.
atk-s0511a3:176_1: Tathā hi dīpaṅkaro asītihatthappamāṇo ahosi, amhākaṁ pana bhagavā aṭṭhārasahatthappamāṇo.
atk-s0511a3:177_0: Kulavemattaṁ nāma keci khattiyakule nibbattanti keci brāhmaṇakule.
atk-s0511a3:177_1: Tathā hi dīpaṅkarādayo khattiyakule nibbattiṁsu, kakusandhakoṇāgamanādayo brāhmaṇakule.
atk-s0511a3:178_0: Padhānavemattaṁ nāma kesañci padhānaṁ ittarameva hoti yathā kassapassa bhagavato , kesañci addhaniyaṁ amhākaṁ bhagavato viya.
atk-s0511a3:179_0: Rasmivemattaṁ nāma maṅgalassa bhagavato sarīrasmi dasasahassilokadhātuṁ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi, amhākaṁ bhagavato byāmamattaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:179_2: Yo yattakaṁ icchasi, tassa tattakaṁ sarīrappabhā pharati.
atk-s0511a3:179_4: Paṭividdhaguṇesu pana kassaci vemattaṁ nāma natthi (dī. ni. aṭṭha.
atk-s0511a3:180_0: Tathā sabbabuddhānaṁ cattāri avijahitaṭṭhānāni nāma honti.
atk-s0511a3:180_4: Jetavane gandhakuṭiyā cattāri mañcapādaṭṭhānāni avijahitāneva honti.
atk-s0511a3:180_6: So pana khuddako vā mahanto vā hoti.
atk-s0511a3:181_0: Aparaṁ pana amhākaṁyeva bhagavato sahajātaparicchedañca nakkhattaparicchedañca visesaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:181_1: Amhākaṁ sabbaññubodhisattena kira saddhiṁ rāhulamātā ānandatthero channo kaṇḍako assarājā nidhikumbhā mahābodhirukkho kāḷudāyīti imāni sata sahajātāni.
atk-s0511a3:181_2: Mahāpuriso kira uttarāsāḷhanakkhatteneva mātukucchiṁ okkami, mahābhinikkhamanaṁ nikkhami , dhammacakkaṁ pavattesi, yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ akāsi.
atk-s0511a3:181_3: Visākhanakkhattena jāto ca abhisambuddho ca parinibbuto ca, māghanakkhattena tassa sāvakasannipāto ceva āyusaṅkhāravosajjanañca ahosi, assayujanakkhattena devorohaṇanti ettakaṁ āharitvā dīpetabbaṁ.
atk-s0511a3:182_0: Iti bhagavā dīpaṅkaro yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā sabbabuddhakiccaṁ katvā anukkamena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0511a3:183_0: Yasmiṁ kira kappe dīpaṅkaradasabalo udapādi, tasmiṁ aññepi taṇhaṅkaro, medhaṅkaro, saraṇaṅkaroti tayo buddhā ahesuṁ.
atk-s0511a3:183_3: Aṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana tamhā kappā ādito paṭṭhāyuppannuppanne sabbabuddhe dassetuṁ idaṁ vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a3:186_0: ‘‘Maṅgalo ca sumano ca, revato sobhito muni;
atk-s0511a3:190_0: ‘‘Tisso phusso ca sambuddho, vipassī sikhi vessabhū;
atk-s0511a3:194_0: Jalitvā aggikkhandhāva, nibbutā te sasāvakā’’ti. (apa. aṭṭha.
